subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matt Kemp hit his eighth home run of the season, one of his three hits, and drove in two runs to lead the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers to a 3-1 win over the Houston Astros on Friday.
snippet: Matt Kemp hit his eighth home run of the season, one of his three hits, and drove in two runs to lead the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers to a 3-1 win over the Houston Astros on Friday.
